Author: Enthusiastus
Name: AkuTrack
Punchline: Shows an improved ingame (and outgame map) and collects the seen information to display later.
Description:
AkuTrack is a project to offer an improved ingame map enriched with information found by visiting on site.

This is achieved by collecting the data on a remote server once a user encounters it.

	- Adds NPC spawns to the map
	- Adds objects like Entrances and Exits
	- Adds Gathering Points independent of current job
